TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content:
They know better than we do exactly how close those wheels are.

Seagulls are actually very difficult to hit with a vehicle.

Cats as well. I'd come up the driveway on one of the big farm tractors, and the cat would just sit there in the middle of the road while the tractor and wagon passed harmlessly right over it, and after I passed it would yawn and look at me like I was rude for waking it up.

They know better than we do exactly how close those wheels are.

Seagulls are actually very difficult to hit with a vehicle.

Cats as well. I'd come up the driveway on one of the big farm tractors, and the cat would just sit there in the middle of the road while the tractor and wagon passed harmlessly right over it, and after I passed it would yawn and look at me like I was rude for waking it up.

Well, you kinda were. Honestly!

xD

They know better than we do exactly how close those wheels are.

Seagulls are actually very difficult to hit with a vehicle.

Cats as well. I'd come up the driveway on one of the big farm tractors, and the cat would just sit there in the middle of the road while the tractor and wagon passed harmlessly right over it, and after I passed it would yawn and look at me like I was rude for waking it up.

I guess it only applies to some animals. Now that I think about it, I do know that pigeons are very chill around us. Even if we get too close they just walk casually off.

Vultures, Do not know anything about distance at all. I was driving back home after a trip to New Mexico on this road in the middle of the desert when suddenly, *WHAP* A vulture flew right in front of the car. The thing actually destroyed my left headlight.

As for your cat:

Bad ROFLcopter! No advertising!

How else am I supposed to get more people to download my things or beta test?!

(Idea: Add the link of the thread in my signature! No shameful self promotion there?)

Where's chobit at?

I just hit level 3 germany, and picked up a Ju87. Now that I can actually do some damage, it's time to dd..ddduel.

Where's chobit at?

Probably applying to be a beta tester, becuase that's what cool people do.

Where's chobit at?

I just hit level 3 germany, and picked up a Ju87. Now that I can actually do some damage, it's time to dd..ddduel.

Chobit just posted in the Word association thread about 1 minute ago. I am not being tracked, don't be silly. that's not how I know this.

Chobit just posted in the Word association thread about 1 minute ago. I am not being tracked, don't be silly. that's not how I know this.

My answer is more correct.

My answer is more correct.

Bring it on

Can i say something?

Okay,I wonder what is the real difference between muffins ,and cupcakes?

Also,Can you cook a egg with large amounts of electricity hitting it?(Not to mention if you microwave a egg then throw it would that be a eggrade?)

Bring it on

/hax

I win.

Okay,I wonder what is the real difference between muffins ,and cupcakes?

Depends if you are a beta tester for Iridium.

Also,Can you cook a egg with large amounts of electricity hitting it?(Not to mention if you microwave a egg then throw it would that be a eggrade?)

Yes.

Can i say something?

Okay,I wonder what is the real difference between muffins ,and cupcakes?

Sweetness level, mostly. Although, don't ask me about chocolate chip muffins. Also, muffins have a slightly thicker batter than cake. That's about it.

Huh,So thats how you tell from a cupcake ,and muffins.I Declare Muffins the national Muffin of the Republic of the moon.

Can we use tatter tots for weapons in real life I mean I have designed ways (If it works) to compress about 42 potatoes into one dense ball that can be shot out of a large potato cannon.Not to mention you would need a large amount of flammable gas.Also shot frozen tatter tots at a high speed they might might thaw then go splat on a windshield scaring the cheese out of the pilot causing him to spin out ,or just kill him if it doesn't thaw ,or disables the plane.Also make super speedy microwave machines cannons that would microwave eggs in 5 seconds then launches them so they explode ,and burn the enemy.So what do you think about this idea...Thinking out loud here...*goes into deep thought about potato powered computers*

...well, then.
